Bio. 281:301-311.

source_data.thread_title: Annotation on step 1 of Staining Labyrinthulomycetes with Propidium Iodide
source_data.annotation:
ATCC Medium: 790 By+ Medium

Yeast Extract..............................................1.0 g

Peptone......................................................1.0 g

D+-Glucose.................................................5.0 g

Seawater...................................................1000 ml

https://www.atcc.org/~/media/920FDAC93FF84B79851C29FBB8049862.ashx

 

'Artemia Soup' medium

1.25 g ground, freeze-dried brine shrimp

autoclaved in 1 liter artifical seawater

Seawater...................................................1000 ml

'Artemia Soup' medium

1.25 g ground, freeze-dried brine shrimp

autoclaved in 1 liter artifical seawater

components.data: Re-suspend cell pellet in 1.5 ml 70% EtOH to fix the cells. Store at 4°C for at least 1 hour (and up to several weeks).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend cell pellet in 1.5 ml 70% EtOH to fix the cells. Store at 4°C for at least 1 hour (and up to several weeks).

components.data:
Prepare PI staining solution (Keep propidium iodide stain in dark) :

  •  0.1% (v/v) Triton X-100 → 1 ul per 1 ml stain
  • 10 ug/mL Propidium iodide (PI) → 1 ul per 1 ml stain
  • 100 ug/mL DNase-free RNase A → 10 ul per 1 ml stain
  • Bring up to 1 ml by adding 1X PBS → 988 ul per 1 ml stain
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Prepare PI staining solution (Keep propidium iodide stain in dark) :

  •  0.1% (v/v) Triton X-100 → 1 ul per 1 ml stain
  • 10 ug/mL Propidium iodide (PI) → 1 ul per 1 ml stain
  • 100 ug/mL DNase-free RNase A → 10 ul per 1 ml stain
  • Bring up to 1 ml by adding 1X PBS → 988 ul per 1 ml stain

components.data: Centrifuge ethanol-suspended cells at 10,000 x g for 5 minutes, remove ethanol thoroughly. Pour off and blot the top of the tube. If necessary, pipette out remaining ethanol without disturbing pellet.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Centrifuge ethanol-suspended cells at 10,000 x g for 5 minutes, remove ethanol thoroughly. Pour off and blot the top of the tube. If necessary, pipette out remaining ethanol without disturbing pellet.

components.data: Re-suspend the cell pellet in 1 ml of PI staining solution; keep in dark at room temp for 30 min or at 37°C for 10 min.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Re-suspend the cell pellet in 1 ml of PI staining solution; keep in dark at room temp for 30 min or at 37°C for 10 min.

components.data: View cells under fluorescence (you may also want to concentrate the cells on a filter). Excitation maximum is 535 nm and emission maximum is 617 nm.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: View cells under fluorescence (you may also want to concentrate the cells on a filter). Excitation maximum is 535 nm and emission maximum is 617 nm.
